author: DragonishChaosArt

text:
Technically, you can hear this in the PvZ final boss theme. :-P
But yeah, I noticed it too when I first played that game. The composer has said that the Mana series was one of her biggest musical influences, even if she never outright admitted to borrowing a melody from this track.

author: km914

text: The snare bass on this is incredible!  What a rhythm to save the world to.  You can really hear aspects of this similar to other tracks in the game, but this one is still one of the most unique and memorable boss themes ever made.  There was a really neat version of this redone, if you search for Aether - Meridian Dance, it's really quite a beautiful rendition.

text: YES! It took a long time, but this finally got included. This is easily one of the best final boss themes ever. Up there with the final boss themes from Final Fantasy 4 and Mario & Luigi 3.
author: PAVGN

text:
Not sure if you still do requests, but after hearing it, I'm certain you've played Portal 2, but I gotta suggest Cara Mia, whether you put it up or not.
A beautiful track that translates to have much meaning toward the game, and even the scene is simply awe inspiring.
Not saying you've gotta upload it or anything, just hope you can recognize this and at the very least check it out if you have not.
